name: Case_Reporter
author: Florian Perret @Cyberpescadito
description: Generate fully customizable case reports in various formats. See README.md for help

configurationItems.name: thehive_apikey
configurationItems.description: API Key with permissions on the target organisation

configurationItems.name: temp_path
configurationItems.description: A path where reports files will be temporary stored

configurationItems.name: max_observables_tlp
configurationItems.description: Filter to define observables max tlp to include in the report. 1=white, 2=green, 3=amber,4=red

configurationItems.name: section_information
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_description
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_customFields
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_summary
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_observables
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_ttps
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_tasks
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: section_tasklogs
configurationItems.description: Set at which position you want this section in the report. Put 0 to disable this section.

configurationItems.name: branding_logo
configurationItems.description: Base64 code of your company png logo. small size (like 80x80) highly recommended
